column5: Well i just picked up a Minn- Kota mk 220 bank charger 2 banks at 10amps per bank Just curious are these pretty straight forward on the instalation I have 2 batteries hooked up in a 24V system Also I have to install a 50 amp manual reset breaker but not sure who to install and were about does it go It is the motorguide reset breaker
My Cabela's Pro Sport onboard charger has a breaker built in. Are you sure you need one installed ? ? ?
From What I have been told I need one
Hey Z I think the breaker is for the trolling motor. My on board charger (dual pro) may have an internal breaker as well.
